MST.name: MST-1
MST.prompt_fragment: a very light skin tone with balanced undertones (#f6ede4)

MST.name: MST-2
MST.prompt_fragment: a light skin tone with warm, yellow undertones (#f3e7db)

MST.name: MST-3
MST.prompt_fragment: a light-medium skin tone with golden undertones (#f7ead0)

MST.name: MST-4
MST.prompt_fragment: a medium skin tone with olive undertones (#eadaba)

MST.name: MST-5
MST.prompt_fragment: a medium-tan skin tone with warm, caramel undertones (#d7bd96)

MST.name: MST-6
MST.prompt_fragment: a tan-brown skin tone with neutral undertones (#a07e56)

MST.name: MST-7
MST.prompt_fragment: a medium-dark brown skin tone with reddish undertones (#825c43)

MST.name: MST-8
MST.prompt_fragment: a dark brown skin tone with cool, espresso undertones (#604134)

MST.name: MST-9
MST.prompt_fragment: a very dark brown skin tone with neutral undertones (#3a312a)

MST.name: MST-10
MST.prompt_fragment: the deepest brown-black skin tone with cool undertones (#292420)

silhouette_presets.name: Linear & Balanced
silhouette_presets.description: A streamlined form with a subtle waist, creating a clean, straight line through the torso.
silhouette_presets.prompt_fragment: a linear and balanced silhouette where the shoulders, waist, and hips are elegantly aligned

silhouette_presets.name: Tapered & Grounded
silhouette_presets.description: A form defined by a tapered torso that gently widens from the waist to the hips.
silhouette_presets.prompt_fragment: a tapered and grounded silhouette, with a torso that gently widens from the waist to the hips

silhouette_presets.name: Inverted Triangle
silhouette_presets.description: A silhouette defined by a broad upper body that tapers toward the hips.
silhouette_presets.prompt_fragment: an inverted triangle silhouette, with broad shoulders and a torso that tapers toward the hips

silhouette_presets.name: Classic Hourglass
silhouette_presets.description: A silhouette with a distinctly narrow waist that balances a proportional bust and hips.
silhouette_presets.prompt_fragment: a classic hourglass silhouette, with a distinctly narrow waist that balances a proportional bust and hips

variants.name: Standard Pose
variants.prompt_fragment: facing forward with a natural, relaxed posture and a neutral expression

variants.name: Walking Pose
variants.prompt_fragment: in a walking pose, showing natural movement

variants.name: Smiling at Camera
variants.prompt_fragment: smiling and looking directly at the camera
